溔字的基本解释

溔
yǎo
〔浩溔〕（水）浩荡，如“溔溔东流，赴海为期。”

溔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎo］
［《廣韻》以沼切，上小，以。］
水广大无边貌。

溔字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溔； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页639第20
【廣韻】以沼切【集韻】【韻會】以紹切，?音鷕。【玉篇】浩溔，水無際也。【司馬相如·上林賦】灝溔潢漾。　又皛溔，水色深白之貌。【郭璞·江賦】沆瀁皛溔。

溔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
溔字的起名意思

暂无。

溔
Basic explanation of words
溔
yǎo
〔Hao 溔〕 (Water) is mighty, such as "the 溔溔 flows eastward, going to the sea for a period of time."
溔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎo］
["Guangyun" cut by marsh, upper small, with. ]
The water is vast and boundless.
溔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　溔; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 639 20
[Guang Yun] Cut with Mush [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Cut with Shao,? [Jade articles] Hao Yin, water is boundless. [Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu] Hao Xing Huangyang.　 You Yan, the water color is deep and white. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Huan Hao Yin.
